entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, addressed by Lupin.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a person who is frustrated with Harry and has a scuffle outside.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is someone whose ear has been cursed.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a person who is in the yard when Harry runs into it.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is someone who has returned to her normal appearance and is in the yard with Kingsley.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is someone who is in the yard with Hermione and clutching a bent coat hanger.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about George's ear being cursed.
Lupin had a scuffle with Hagrid outside.
Harry met Hermione in the yard.
Harry met Kingsley in the yard.
